mapper.select: SELECT m.cnnum, c.csname, g.giname, m.cnam, m.cnrest, m.cndate, m.cnperiod, m.cnstatus, g.giunit FROM contract m, costomer c, goodsinfo g WHERE (c.cscode = m.cscode AND g.gicode = m.gicode) AND ((m.cndate>=TO_DATE(#{startDt}, 'YY/MM/DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDt}, 'YY/MM/DD') >= m.cndate) AND m.cscode = #{cusCode} AND m.gicode =#{goodsCode})
SELECT cscode, csname, csnum, cstel FROM costomer WHERE csgb = '제품거래'
SELECT cscode, csname, csnum, cstel FROM costomer WHERE csname like '%' || #{csname} || '%' AND csgb = '제품거래'
SELECT gicode, giname, giunit FROM goodsinfo
SELECT gicode, giname, giunit FROM goodsinfo WHERE giname like '%' || #{giname} || '%'
